column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We got the XL Malnati Chicago Classic
column2: which was more than enough to feed us 4 (2 gigantic slices each). The classic sausage
column3: cheese and tomato combination was delicious. The hidden layer of sausage was such a pleasant surprise! There wasn't much of a cheese pull
column4: albeit the pizza has already cooled a bit after I brought it back to our hotel room. The most disappointing part was the crust. It was indeed deep dish
column5: however the dough wasn't cooked all the way through. I could distinctly see the cooked vs uncooked layers in the crust.
